alert.note: Alert for Coastal Hernando; Coastal Hillsborough; Coastal Pasco; Inland Hernando; Inland Hillsborough; Inland Pasco; Pinellas; Sumter (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued April 02 at 2:06PM EDT by NWS Tampa Bay
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of Sumter, Pasco, Hernando, northern Pinellas and northwestern Hillsborough Counties through 245 PM EDT... At 205 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 7 miles west of Mascotte to Jasmine Estates. Movement was southeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Tampa, Spring Hill, Clearwater, Largo, New Port Richey, Zephyrhills, Brooksville, Wildwood, Dade City, Bushnell, Hudson, Holiday, Lutz, St. Leo, Weeki Wachee, Palm Harbor, New Port Richey East, South Brooksville, Zephyrhills South and North Brooksville. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 700 PM EDT for central and west central Florida.

area.areaDesc: Coastal Hernando; Coastal Hillsborough; Coastal Pasco; Inland Hernando; Inland Hillsborough; Inland Pasco; Pinellas; Sumter
